title: Nenjam Enum Oorinilae Lyrics Aaru
stanzas:
nenjam enum oorinilae
kaadhal enum theriuvinilae
kanavu enum vaasalilae
ennai katti kolla vandhaayae

vaazhkai enum vaanthilae
manasu enum maegathilae
aasai enum maazhaiyinilae
enai chotta chotta nenaithaayae

naan thaniyaai thaniyaai irundhanae
nee thunaiyaai thunaiyaai vandhaayae
indru idhamaai idhamaai tholaindhaanae
kaadhalae...

nenjam enum oorinilae
kaadhal enum theriuvinilae
kanavu enum vaasalilae
ennai katti kolla vandhaayae

hey kathula yaeni vechu
un moochula erangiduvaen
nerupula veedu katti
un nenpula vaazhndhiduvaen

paena edutha thaana kaigal
un paerai thaan ezhuthiyathae.
koyila paatha thaana kaigal
unakaagathaan kumbiduthae

nenjam enum oorinilae
kaadhal enum theriuvinilae
kanavu enum vaasalilae
ennai katti kolla vandhaayae

b-o-y boy, boy-inna paiyyan
g-i-r-l girl, giril-unna ponnu
this girl is so hot
that will make him crazy
They are just gonna rock
so take it easy

indha rendu paerukullaiyum
touching touching
ada anytime anywhere
kissing kissing

kannula kaiyuru katti
un uruvatha pudichikuvaen.
mannula naan vizhundhu
un nizhalaiyum aendhikkuvaen.

mazhai varum pothu
nee vandhu odhungina.
koondhala virichu kodai pudipaen
nee azha vaendaam india naatil
vengaayathai thadai vidhippaen

nenjam enum oorinilae
kaadhal enum theriuvinilae
kanavu enum vaasalilae
ennai katti kolla vandhaayae
